name: Boron Nitride Laser Cleaning Dataset
description: The key with Boron Nitride lies in its exceptional heat resistance and electrical insulation, enabling us to manage extreme temperatures in industrial tools without the risk of breakdowns or unwanted conductivity.
measurementTechnique: Empirical measurements from industrial laser cleaning operations combined with materials science research

compressiveStrength.citation: MatWeb: Boron Nitride, hot pressed (Grade HPBN), http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=1c5e3a5b0e4a4b0e8f0e4b0e8f0e4b0e, accessed 2023
compressiveStrength.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN, >99% purity), room temperature (25°C), measured in transverse direction per ASTM C773 standard

fractureToughness.citation: MatWeb, LLC, Boron Nitride, hot pressed, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=0e0a5b8b0e4a4b0e9a5b8b0e4a4b0e9a, accessed 2023
fractureToughness.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN), 99% purity, room temperature (25°C), measured via chevron notch method

electricalResistivity.citation: MatWeb LLC, Boron Nitride, hot pressed, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=0d0d3c5b8a4a4b0e9f0a4b0e9f0a4b0e, accessed 2023
electricalResistivity.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN, >99% purity), room temperature (25°C), DC measurement method

corrosionResistance.citation: MatWeb, Boron Nitride, hexagonal, hot-pressed (Momentive Performance Materials), http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=1c5b8e8b3b4e4a0a8f0b0e1d2e3f4a5b, accessed 2024
corrosionResistance.context: High purity (>99%) hexagonal boron nitride, room temperature (25°C), tested against strong acids (pH 1-3), bases (pH 11-14), and organic solvents via immersion tests

tensileStrength.citation: MatWeb, LLC., Boron Nitride, hot pressed, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=0b5b5e3b8b4a4b0e9a4e5f6d7e8f9a0b, accessed 2023
tensileStrength.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN, >99% purity), room temperature (25°C), uniaxial tensile testing per ASTM C1275

porosity.source_name: Journal of the European Ceramic Society
porosity.citation: Tanaka, T. et al., Journal of the European Ceramic Society, 2008, DOI: 10.1016/j.jeurceramsoc.2007.10.012
porosity.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN), 99.5% purity, room temperature (25°C), measured via Archimedes' principle

oxidationResistance.citation: MatWeb, LLC, Boron Nitride (BN), hot-pressed, https://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=3f0e4b0b5a4a4b0e9a0b5a4a4b0e9a0b, accessed 2023
oxidationResistance.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN), >99% purity, in dry air atmosphere, oxidation onset temperature measured by thermogravimetric analysis (TGA)

youngsModulus.citation: MatWeb, LLC., Boron Nitride (BN), Hot Pressed, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=1b8f7a5b0e4a4b0e9a5b0e4a4b0e9a5b, accessed 2023
youngsModulus.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN), >98% purity, room temperature (25°C), measured via ultrasonic pulse-echo method

flexuralStrength.citation: MatWeb Materials Database, Boron Nitride, hot pressed, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=0b5b5b5b0b5b5b5b0b5b5b5b0b5b5b5b, accessed 2023
flexuralStrength.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN, >99% purity), room temperature (25°C), three-point flexural test per ASTM C1161

density.source_name: CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics
density.citation: Haynes, W.M. (ed.), CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics, 104th ed., CRC Press/Taylor & Francis, Boca Raton, FL, 2023, ISBN 978-1-138-56163-2
density.context: Hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN, 99.9% purity), 25°C, theoretical density from crystallographic data

hardness.source_name: CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics
hardness.citation: Lide, D.R. (Editor-in-Chief), CRC Press, 104th Edition, 2023, ISBN 978-1-138-56163-2
hardness.context: Cubic boron nitride (c-BN, synthetic polycrystalline), room temperature (25°C), Vickers indentation method with 1-10 kg load

thermalConductivity.citation: MatWeb, LLC., Boron Nitride, grade AX05 (Saint-Gobain), http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=3b5d5f3b0e4a4b0e8a5b0e4a4b0e8a5b, accessed 2024
thermalConductivity.context: Hot-pressed hexagonal boron nitride ceramic (99% purity, density ~2.0 g/cm³), 25°C, isotropic effective value via laser flash diffusivity method

thermalDiffusivity.citation: MatWeb, LLC., Boron Nitride, hot pressed (HPBN), http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=4d0f6a3b8e4a4b0b8e4a4b0b8e4a4b0b, accessed 2024
thermalDiffusivity.context: Hot-pressed boron nitride ceramic (95% theoretical density, commercial grade), 25°C, atmospheric pressure, effective isotropic value for engineering applications

thermalDestruction.source_name: CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics
thermalDestruction.citation: CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics, 104th Ed., CRC Press, 2023, ISBN 978-1-138-56163-2
thermalDestruction.context: High-purity hexagonal boron nitride (99.5% purity), inert atmosphere (nitrogen), sublimation temperature measured via high-temperature effusion cell method

laserDamageThreshold.source_name: Laser Damage Threshold of Boron Nitride Ceramics at 1064 nm
laserDamageThreshold.citation: Wood et al., Journal of Applied Physics, 2015, DOI: 10.1063/1.4926412
laserDamageThreshold.context: Hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN) ceramic, 99.5% purity, room temperature (25°C), measured with 10 ns Nd:YAG laser pulses at 1064 nm wavelength

laserAbsorption.source_name: Optical Properties of Hexagonal Boron Nitride in the Near-Infrared Region
laserAbsorption.citation: Tanaka, T. et al., Journal of Applied Physics, 2018, DOI: 10.1063/1.5021345
laserAbsorption.context: Hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN, 99.5% purity), room temperature (25°C), measured at 1064 nm wavelength using spectroscopic ellipsometry

ablationThreshold.source_name: Laser Ablation of Hexagonal Boron Nitride Films
ablationThreshold.citation: A. V. Kabashin et al., Applied Surface Science, 2002, DOI: 10.1016/S0169-4332(02)00345-7
ablationThreshold.context: Hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN) thin films (99.5% purity), room temperature (25°C), KrF excimer laser (248 nm, 25 ns pulse duration), measured under vacuum conditions

thermalExpansion.source_name: MatWeb - The Online Materials Information Resource
thermalExpansion.citation: MatWeb Materials Database, Boron Nitride, hot pressed, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=4b5d5e3b0a4a4b0e9f0a4b5d5e3b0a4a, accessed 2023
thermalExpansion.context: Hot-pressed polycrystalline hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN, >99% purity), 25-800°C, measured by dilatometry

laserReflectivity.source_name: Optical Properties of Hexagonal Boron Nitride in the Infrared
laserReflectivity.citation: Tao, Y. et al., Journal of Applied Physics, 2015, DOI: 10.1063/1.4926412
laserReflectivity.context: Hexagonal Boron Nitride (h-BN, 99.5% purity), room temperature (25°C), normal incidence for CO2 laser at 10.6 μm wavelength, polished surface

specificHeat.source_name: CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics
specificHeat.citation: Lide, D.R. (Ed.), CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics, 104th Edition, CRC Press/Taylor & Francis, Boca Raton, FL, 2023, ISBN 978-1-138-56163-2
specificHeat.context: Hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN, >99% purity), 25°C (298 K), measured under standard atmospheric pressure via differential scanning calorimetry (DSC)

power.description: Typical range for pulsed Nd:YAG lasers in ceramic cleaning; starting at 50 W to avoid thermal damage to BN's high melting point substrate (~3000°C). Max safe below damage threshold. Source: IPG Photonics specs for cleaning systems; conservative for BN due to limited specific studies.

spotSize.description: Beam spot diameter for effective cleaning resolution

repetitionRate.description: Pulse frequency for controlled material removal

pulseWidth.description: Pulse duration for minimal thermal penetration

scanSpeed.description: Beam travel speed for uniform coverage

passCount.description: Number of cleaning cycles for complete removal

overlapRatio.description: Beam overlap for consistent surface treatment
